content: ज्ञ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ज्ञा-क] (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) {@--1@} Knowing, familiar with; कार्यज्ञ, निमित्तज्ञ, शास्त्रज्ञ, सर्वज्ञ &c. {@--2@} Wise; as in ज्ञंमन्य thinking oneself to be wise. --ज्ञः {@--1@} A wise and learned man. {@--2@} The sentient soul. {@--3@} The planet Mercury. {@--4@} The planet Mars. {@--5@} An epithet of Brahmā.
